# confirmationRequired(with:)

**Type Method**

Creates an object whose resolution requires confirmation from the user before proceeding.

## Declaration

```swift
class func confirmationRequired(with noteToConfirm: INNote?) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **noteToConfirm**: The object that resolves the request but must be confirmed by the user.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INNoteResolutionResult] object.

## Discussion

Use this method when you locate a single note but cannot determine with enough certainty that it is the one intended by the user. For example, you might ask for confirmation when the note text does not match precisely. Provide an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INNote] object with as much information about the note as you have available.

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.
- **disambiguation(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.
